mapper.select: select z.id as articleId,z.title,z.content,z.comment,z.summary,z.love,a.id as tid,a.tagname from z_article z left join (select act.aid,t.id,t.tagname from z_actmapptags act inner join z_tag t on act.tid=t.id ) as a on z.id=a.aid
select * from z_article where id in (select act.aid from z_actmapptags act where act.tid=#{id})
